name: Chex® Popcorn-Pretzel Chunk
author: Chex
summary: A favorite among the Chex® team members, this crunchy super-snack disappeared in no time. Don't be surprised if the same thing happens at your next party!
ingredients: ½ cup candy-coated milk chocolate pretzels
directions: Spray very large microwavable bowl with cooking spray
Mix cereal, popcorn and pretzel crackers in bowl
In medium microwavable bowl, microwave marshmallow creme and butter uncovered on High about 1 minute, stirring after 30 seconds, until creme and butter are melted and can be stirred smooth
Stir, pour over cereal mixture, stirring until evenly coated
Microwave uncovered on High 2 to 3 minutes, stirring every minute, until mixture is glazed
Spread on waxed paper to cool
